oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hillery, third baseman, from the Nashville Daily American, 1886 March 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A newspaper image of James John Hillery, third baseman of the professional baseball team the Nashville Americans. In 1885, the Southern League was formed, and Nashville’s entry into the new league for two seasons was the Nashville Americans. Forms part of the Nashville Daily American Newspaper Collection. 1 digital photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hillery, James J.
